effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 50% for 3 turns to all allies
Restore 6000 (+9x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies
name: Love You All
Love You All
全心全意
박애주의자
De l'amour pour tous
Hab euch lieb
Amor para todos
desc_short: Boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance, and gradually restore HP
提高全體隊員火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值+持續恢復HP
아군 전체의 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 상승+HP 서서히 회복
Augmente la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres et restaure progressivement les PV
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Erd, Licht und Dunkel, alle Verb, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Aumenta la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad, recupera VIT poco a poco
desc_long: Boosts fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance, and gradually restores HP.
提高全體隊員火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值，同時持續恢復HP。
아군 전체의 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 상승하고, HP가 서서히 회복합니다.
Augmente la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres et restaure progressivement les PV
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, und Licht, alle Verb, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Aumenta la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad, recupera la VIT progresivamente.
